# t-input-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                     | Type                                                | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (required) Input text class     | `string`                                            | `''`        |
| `theme`       | `theme`        | (optional) Input text theme     | `string`                                            | `''`        |
| `validator`   | --             | (optional) Input text validator | `(string \| ValidatorEntry \| Validator<string>)[]` | `undefined` |
| `value`       | `value`        | (optional) Input text value     | `string`                                            | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                         | Type                  |
| --------- | ----------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `changed` | (optional) Input text event changed | `CustomEvent<string>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                | Description                                    |
| ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `--input-text-border`               | Border of the input-text                       |
| `--input-text-border-radius`        | Border radius of the input-text                |
| `--input-text-font-family`          | Font family of the input-text                  |
| `--input-text-font-size`            | Font size of the input-text                    |
| `--input-text-padding`              | Padding of the input-text                      |
| `--input-text-validation-color`     | Color of the validation text of the input-text |
| `--input-text-validation-font-size` | Font size of the validation of the input-text  |
| `--input-text-validation-margin`    | Margin of the validation of the input-text     |
| `--input-text-validation-opacity`   | Opacity of the validation of the input-text    |
